text: Acarospora americana is a dark brown to black verriculous to areloate or squamulose crustose lichen with deeply immersed reddish to blackish-brown apothecia found in the Sierra Nevada and other southern California mountain ranges.Field Guide to California Lichens, Stephen Sharnoff, Yale University Press, 2014, Lichen spot tests are all negative. ==References== americana Category:Fungi described in 1929
title: Acarospora americana
